original_text: Jesus did answer the woman this time. He said, ‘It is not right to take food from the children and then throw it to the dogs.’
korean_text: 대답하여 이르시되 자녀의 떡을 취하여 개들에게 던짐이 마땅하지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus did answer the woman this time.
'It is not right to take food from the children
and then throw it to the dogs.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 개들에게 던지는 것도 옳지 않습니다.'
